BoxIntent: Bridge operator converting semantic-form states into Π-evaluable causal states.

Constraints.Functoriality: Φ→Π is functorial under Box morphisms
Constraints.Normalization: Produces Π-normal form from any semantic projection
Constraints.Uniqueness: For each B, Φ→Π(B) is the unique minimal Π-ready representative

CrossLinks.Π: Output is consumed directly by Π
CrossLinks.δ: Ensures δ-gradients are encoded in causal order before evaluation
CrossLinks.Φ: Takes Φ-domain objects; identity on Φ\_c-subspace
